website_summaries.verdict: The Canon EOS 6D is a top-notch full-frame camera in a compact body. With a relatively affordable price, enthusiast-friendly features, and spectacular image quality, it's an easy Editors' Choice.
pros: Superb image quality at high ISOs
Supported USB tethered and Wi-Fi remote control
cons: Not the fastest camera on the block

customer_reviews.title: Can't fault it, it's just great!
customer_reviews.text: Entry level full-frame camera that works as expected. This model has been on the market for a while now, and because of that it works beautifully with the updated firmware.
customer_reviews.author: Lightman

customer_reviews.title: and the low-light performance brilliant. Battery life is good
customer_reviews.text: Finally moving from a 40D on to the full frame 6D has been intuitive and painless. The quality of the images (I use a Canon 24-70mm 2.8L and a Canon 40mm 2.8 day to day) is astounding, and the low-light performance brilliant. Battery life is good, though I do intend to buy a battery grip soon. Great camera. No issues. (Though Canon should update their iOS software)
customer_reviews.author: Richard W H Bray

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had this for about 2 years now and very happy with the results. Great camera.
customer_reviews.author: Quack

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing camera. Bit on the heavy side but feels really well made.
customer_reviews.author: Gav

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bit of kit, as good a price as I could find
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding in low light
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant camera. Pictures taken in very low light are crystal clear with very little grain ... amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the Canon 6D. Brilliant colour tone in the photos I have taken
customer_reviews.author: Giles Thomas

customer_reviews.title: perfect choice
customer_reviews.text: Perfect low light performance with my 2 prime lenses, 40mm F2.8 pancake and 28mm F1.8, both Canon lenses. At the moment I photograph in maximum quality JPEG only as I don't find the need for RAW yet......perfect If sending them to Facebook,upload at maximum, as shot, resolution and they are smaller in dimension when viewed but crystal clear sharp.
customer_reviews.author: BobbyC101st

customer_reviews.title: Marvellous
customer_reviews.text: Big, beautiful viewfinder is the first thing that grabs you. I much prefer the simpler 19 point AF to the more sophisticated AF found on the 5D3. Images are razor sharp (with the right lens!) and ergonomics are well thought out. I cannot praise this camera enough and for those who do not need the more complex AF of the 5D3 but who want the same processor and sensor, save yourselves a lot of money and buy the 6D.
customer_reviews.author: Blackdog64

customer_reviews.title: And it doesn't disappoint. The auto focus is much better and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I recently sold my Canon 5D MkII and have bought the 6D as a replacement. And it doesn't disappoint. The auto focus is much better and the high ISO images have a great deal less grain than with the 5D. It's a great step forward and I couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kleinsteuber

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Camera like new works very good very happy and fast service from shop would use again excellent service thank you
customer_reviews.author: peter coombes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing camera. Big step I've just done to full frame world. Delivery was faster then expected. All good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A tool for creating.
customer_reviews.text: This camera is a joy to use, it has got a REAL bright viewfinder and a REAL very comfortable grip. The autofocus system is not for sports and very fast movements, but it is very good for everything else, oh yes, and the low light capabilities.... Amazing ! About the image quality : Just shoot raw, you got the best. All in all for me it is not an entry level or amateur full frame camera ( as many suggests ) , it is a professional tool especially for portraits. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Tamas Konya

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with this camera, nice price, faster and good.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto Baucis

customer_reviews.title: camera great. I purchased this camera from Electronicsonly4u via amazon ...
customer_reviews.text: camera great. I purchased this camera from Electronicsonly4u via amazon under the spring bank cash back offer .So that was the main reason why I bought it. Applied for my cash back but got the reply from canon that I was not eligible even though it was stated on the top of the amazon web page. Canon states that this is a gray import as it was not destined for the European market, this is a disgrace people know what they sell I wonder if I get a reply this looks like a real rip off what do you think?
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Received a toy instead of a camera
customer_reviews.text: We had the worse experience as instead of a real camera we have received a TOY. A rubber camera. Amazon has reimbursed us and couldn't tell how this happened but this is what has happened to us. Buying a 1.500 pounds camera toy wasn't funny at all.
customer_reviews.author: PAVANATO Giovanna

customer_reviews.title: Would be great if the product quality can be ensured better
customer_reviews.text: Camera doesn't work. Battery was fully charged, and there was no problem with it. Defective body. Extremely inconvinent to go through the return process and very disappointing. Would be great if the product quality can be ensured better.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT AND SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: The product is fantastic..the delivery was fantastic. I only wish the specification of what was included in the deal had been on the Amazon site..ie....includes battery and battery charger but no memory card.
customer_reviews.author: RODNEY LOVE

customer_reviews.title: What you need to know
customer_reviews.text: I have to tell, this camera is the perfect one if you want to start to make a profesional photos to after edit in HDR in photoshop or Lightroom. The differences are high of the rest of the cameras on the same price. I being making pictures with this camera since one year already and I’m more than happy to bought it. I wish you my review help you to diced.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great camera, I bought it as a step up from my Canon 650D. The picture quality is great and I found it easy to use although there are some differences as it is an advancement from my previous model. I have had it for 3 months now and I have used it many times since purchase. The only downside was having to purchase some new lenses as some of my old lenses were not compatible. Still it was worth it no regrets in purchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: Porcus

customer_reviews.title: Astonishing camera
customer_reviews.text: Easy and comfortable to hold and work with, weight is just right, size is just right, looks beautiful, its very well made and neat camera. Fabulous camera for low light(available light), portraiture, art, every day and landscape work.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Ahmad J. Zaigham

customer_reviews.title: 6d is superb!
customer_reviews.text: I've got two of these and use them for weddings, image quality is outstanding with good lenses on board. Better in low light than the 5d mk3 and image quality is the same as mk3. It's also half the price, this is the sensible persons choice!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Rees

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant studio camera
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant studio camera. That's what its made for. Don't expect it to perform fantastic on sports or wildlife or fast moving subjects (it wont). Its what I call a patient camera. Take your time and you get great results. The screen is 3" not 3.2"
customer_reviews.author: Dejaviewphotography.eu

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice for the enthusiast
customer_reviews.text: All things considered, this Canon EOS 6D is an excellent choice for the enthusiast and club photographer looking for a full-frame DSLR. These users will find that they have just about everything they need, and a bit more besides Pros: + Enthusiast-centric controls + Remote control via Wi-Fi + GPS technology + High image quality Cons - No flash - Lacks some connections - 97% viewfinder coverage - Limited viewfinder overlay There are some decent options like this Canon kit so be sure to compare on price:
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

product_meta.title: Canon EOS 6D Camera Body with EF 24-70 mm f/4 L IS USM Lens
product_meta.description:
Style Name:24-70mm LensThis kit is suitable for portrait photography and travel, offering tight control over depth of field and a large choice of wide-angle EF lenses.

BOX CONTAINS
EOS 6D, Eyecup Eb, Camera Cover R-F-3, Wide Strap EW-EOS 6D, Battery Pack LP-E6, Battery Charger LC-E6E, Power Cord, Stereo AV Cable AVC-DC400ST, Interface Cable IFC-200U, EF 24-70mm f/4L IS USM lens, Lens cap E-77 II, Canon Rear lens cap E, Lens hood EW-83L, Lens case LP1219
feature_bullets: Full-frame 20.2-mp sensor^11-point AF sensitive down to -3EV^Full-HD video^Tough, lightweight construction^GPS records your location
